Tiger King’s Carole Baskin was a relatively prolific political donor last year, contributing more than $30,000 to multiple congressional candidates, FEC records show.
Baskin, an animal rights activist and CEO of the non-profit Big Cat Rescue, is best known for her appearance on Netflix’s documentary series Tiger King.
